<!-- OC: 嬭, not 妳/你 -->

subSections.title: Definitions
Usage notes
subSections.text: This character is mostly used in traditional Chinese when referring to a female person. Although {{lang|zh|妳}} is rarely used in simplified Chinese, it may still be found in some contexts.
